thread.title: High School Football Player Andre Smith Dies After Taking Hit During Game
thread.title_full: High School Football Player Andre Smith Dies After Taking Hit During Game | Complex

author: Jose Martinez
title: High School Football Player Andre Smith Dies After Taking Hit During Game
text:
For the seventh time this year, a high school football player has died. That's seven too many. On Thursday night, Andre Smith of Bogan High School was hit on the last play of the game against Chicago Vocational High . “It was a kick return play,” Stagg Stadium announcer Jimmy Smith told the Chicago Sun Times . “(Smith) was running and a guy blocked him, hit him pretty good and that was it. He went down and he got back up and walked backed to the visitor’s side of the field.”
After walking off the field, Smith collapsed and was rushed to the Advocate Christ Medical Center. He died Friday morning. He was just 17 years old.
Smith, who also played basketball and competed in track, was looking to make the Western Illinois football program as a walk on.
 Chicago Sun Times ]
